title: My Pixel 5 does not respond to touch when laying on a flat surface or while on google charging dock
content: My Pixel 5 does not respond to touch while laying flat on a surface or while charging on a Pixel stand. The issue happens with or without a case and with or withot a screen protector. I've restarted the phone a million times and installed all updates available through today, 10 April 2021.  Any fix for this, or do I just need to get a new phone?
